altername_name: The Mystery of the Clock Seller
The Adventure of the Rosetta Stone
name: Sherlock Holmes Returns
overview: A two pack of text adventure mysteries, written in Adventurewriter/Quill including "The Mystery of the Clock Seller" & "The Adventure of the Rosetta Stone". The Mystery of the Clock Seller: The game finds Holmes and Watson trying to unravel the events that led to the death of Otto Meinwold - seller of fine antique clocks. Scotland Yard thinks the case is rather clear-cut. That Meinwold, found strangled with a pendulum cord from a Grandfather clock, was murdered for the daily take from his shop. Holmes believes there is much more to it. The Adventure of the Rosetta Stone: Holmes is up against the mysterious "French Reclamation League" and their threat to steal this famous artifact.
